fulltext:
MINH THONG LE 
Position Applied: Technical Leader 
Experience 
10/2018–Now 
Technical Leader• Digital Marketing Co., LTD 
08/2017–11/2018 
Senior Backend Developer• Pearl Application Co., LTD 
11/2014–04/2017 
Backend Developer • SAMSUNG HCMC CE COMPLEX Co., LTD 
06/2013–10/2014 
Junior Backend Developer • PHP Group International Viet 
Nam Co., LTD. 
Summary 
 More than 5 years experience develop technically 
sophisticated web applications using PHP, Nodejs and 
mobile application using Java (Android) and more. So 
that I found one thing, the programming language is 
not important, the important is solution. 
 Have experience with some payment gateways, such as 
Paypal, Chargebee, Stripe, … 
 Be able to apply blockchain technology solution to 
project.  
 Be able to setup and deploy application to production 
environment. 
 Less than a year experience at technical leader, be able 
to work with customer to analysis project requirement 
and provide solution to build it. And I have experience 
to manage small team about 5 members.  
 Be able to estimation and keep schedule plan of 
project. 
Thu Duc District 
Ho Chi Minh City 
12/12/1990 
 Be able to training for new developer. 
 Good teamwork. 
 Working hard.  
Education 
HCMC University of Technology and Education 
 Bachelor of software engineer 
 GPA: Good 
Project Involved 
Some large projects that I had joined with developer or leader 
position as below: 
1. Fidex Exchange  
 Description: The cryptocurrency exchange.  
 Programming language: Nodejs, PHP 
 Database: MongoDB, MySQL. 
 My position in this project: Leader. 
2. Proof Stack 
 Description: Blockchain + Qualified Timestamp 
Proof. It has been used to create and verify proof of 
picture, music and video in Turkey. 
 Programming language: Nodejs, Blockchain 
Technology (Smart contract) 
 Database: MongoDB. 
 My position in this project: Backend Developer. 
3. Knock Down Internal Production System 
 Description: That’s production system. It has been 
used to manage production plan and production 
progress at real time. It has been launched cross 
country Korea, China and Vietnam (Factory of 
Samsung). 
 Programming language: Nodejs, PHP, Java 
(Android). 
 Database: Oracle, MySQL, SQLite 
 My position in this project: Leader of VN Team. 
4. Finish Good Container Management System 
 Description: That’s production system. It has been 
used to manage stuffing plan and stuffing result at 
real time.  
 Programming language: PHP, Java (Android). 
 Database: MySQL, Oracle. 
 My position in this project: Backend and mobile 
developer. 
5. SEHC Intranet System 
 Description: Intranet system on website and mobile 
application. 
 Programming language: Nodejs, PHP, Java 
(Android). 
 Database: MySQL, Oracle, SQL, SQLite. 
 My position in this project: member.
